hero.title: Free Auction Platform
hero.description: 100% free, open-source auction platform for charity events, fundraisers, and personal use. Perfect for yearly decluttering, garage sales, or selling items to friends. No fees, no limits.
hero.demoHint: Click to watch how Auktiva works
hero.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

features.sectionDescription: Powerful features built for organizers and bidders alike.

realTimeBidding.title: Real-time Bidding
realTimeBidding.description: Watch bids happen instantly with our live updates. No refreshing required.

privateSecure.title: Private & Secure
privateSecure.description: Host invite-only auctions with role-based access control. Your data stays private.

multiCurrency.title: Multi-Currency
multiCurrency.description: Support for global events with automatic currency formatting for USD, EUR, GBP, and more.

smartNotifications.title: Smart Notifications
smartNotifications.description: Get notified immediately when you're outbid or when watched items are ending.

richMedia.title: Rich Media
richMedia.description: Showcase items with high-resolution image galleries and detailed descriptions.

offlineExchange.title: Offline Exchange
offlineExchange.description: Perfect for charity events. We handle the bidding, you handle the item exchange offline.

useCases.sectionDescription: Whether you're raising funds for a cause or clearing out your garage, Auktiva makes it simple.

charity.title: Charity Fundraisers
charity.description: Host silent auctions for nonprofits, schools, churches, and community events.

declutter.title: Yearly Decluttering
declutter.description: Clear out unused items from your home or storage and let friends bid on them.

family.title: Friends & Family
family.description: Private auctions for family gatherings, neighborhood sales, or friend groups.

office.title: Office Clearouts
office.description: Companies can auction old equipment, furniture, or promotional items to employees.

howItWorks.sectionDescription: Four simple steps to run your auction. Focus on what matters, we'll handle the bidding.

step1.title: Create Auction
step1.description: Set up your event in minutes with customizable details and branding.

step2.title: Invite Guests
step2.description: Share a private link or send email invitations to your participants.

step3.title: Live Bidding
step3.description: Guests place bids in real-time from their phones. Excitement builds!

step4.title: Wrap Up
step4.description: Handle exchange and settlement offline, your way.

step5.title: Celebrate
step5.description: Celebrate your success with your contributors and raise awareness for your cause!

impact.sectionDescription: Every contribution counts. Watch how individual donations come together to fill the jar of opportunity.

cta.title: Ready to start your auction?
cta.description: Whether it's a charity fundraiser or a yearly declutter sale, Auktiva is completely free. Open source, no fees, and built for communities.
cta.freeForever: 100% free forever - no fees, no limits
cta.selfHostDescription: Run this open-source auction platform on your own server with full control. One command to get started.
cta.seeDocumentation: See the <link>developer documentation</link> for more details.
